author: Laura Fletcher
title: New reagent supplier will allow for 900,000 tests
description: The Health Service Executive and the National Virus Reference Laboratory UCD have secured to a contract to obtain enough reagent to carry out 900,000 Covid-19 tests.
content:
The Health Service Executive and the National Virus Reference Laboratory UCD have secured to a contract to obtain enough reagent to carry out 900,000 Covid-19 tests.
Genomics Medicine Ireland Limited (GMI) is supplying the test kits, and the components for t… [+1970 chars]
